ygData.subject: Re: Hail all Shadowknights!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ogres and Trolls can go into one anothers towns.  Just not to certain guilds.  I am a Troll SK and have been to Oggok many times.  The only thing you have
ygData.messageBody:
>We are 3/4 warriors 1/4 necros so I wouldn't worry to much about int. Also
>they can't bash unless thay have a shield and all the Shadow Knights only
>weapons are 2h.
>
>Ogres-Infravision, bash, highest stats except int.
> -Only can go to two towns(Ogre and DE), Exp penatly.
>Trolls-Infravsion, bash, regeneration, 2nd highest stats except int.
> -Only can go to two towns(Grobb and DE) Biggest exp penatly.(My
>opinion, hardest character to play)
>Dark Elves-Ultravision, highest int, can go to all 3 evil towns.
> -No bash, low stats, exp penatly

Ogres and Trolls can go into one anothers towns. Just not to certain
guilds. I am a Troll SK and have been to Oggok many times. The only thing
you have to look out for is to stay away from the warriors guild, not that
hard, and Chef Dugan, doesn't like us for some reason. I assume this is
similar for the Ogres as well.

The Troll SK is a great solo class. I am currently 21st level and soloing
is still no problem for me. The increased Strength I believe does make a
difference, just not until you get to 20th level. My damage increased by
over 5 points from what it was doing with my halberd.

Also, I have had no problems with mana and didn't touch my int. Once you
get your skills high enough they have no prob maxing out. Once I level, it
only takes me a couple of battles to get them up to max. On spells again, I
should be able to layer on those spells with ease. Yes, we are tanks and
who would want to solo a Spectre, thats why there are other people in your
party. I was attacked by a Spectre at level 19 and lived to zone, was a
pillar 2. Our spells help us a lot, but we are mostly tanks with mana bars
and pets, at least with my experiences.

Just my 2 cents

Grumbel
